feed.title: Track Awesome Analytics Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of analytics frameworks, software and other tools.

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Jun 09, 2022
entry.content:
General analytics

  • PostHog - Open-source product analytics to track users, events, funnels and trends. Alternative to Mixpanel/Amplitude/Heap. Also includes session recording (alternative to HotJar) and feature flag/experimentation tools (alternative to Optimizely).(Source Code (⭐28k)) MIT Python

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Jun 06, 2022
entry.content:
Developer analytics

  • Hatica - Engineering Analytics to boost developer productivity © SaaS

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Mar 15, 2021
entry.content:
Privacy focused analytics

  • Piwik PRO - A privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics with built-in consent management. Hosted in EU, in your private cloud or on-premises. © SaaS self-hosted

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Mar 11, 2021
entry.content:
Endpoints

  • Census - The easiest way to sync your customer data from your cloud data warehouse to SaaS applications like Salesforce, Marketo, HubSpot, Zendesk, etc. Census is the operational analytics platform that syncs your data warehouse with all your favorite apps. Get your customer success, sales & marketing teams on the same page by keeping customer data in sync. No engineering favors required—just SQL. SaaS

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Feb 02, 2021
entry.content:
General analytics

  • Count - notebook-based analytics platform, use SQL or drag-and-drop to build queries. © SaaS

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Jan 28, 2021
entry.content:
General analytics

  • userTrack - Self-hosted web analytics with heatmaps, session-recordings, A/B tests and more. © Self-Hosted PHP

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Jan 27, 2021
entry.content:
General analytics

  • Panelbear - free real-time website analytics. Supports custom event tracking, email digests, and site speed metrics. © SaaS

Privacy focused analytics

  • Metrical - A privacy-first web analytics tool for everyone. © SaaS

Developer analytics

  • Pull Panda - Metrics and insights for engineering teams © SaaS
  • Screenful - Visualise and share your project progress © SaaS
  • Haystack - Metrics and insights for engineering teams © SaaS
  • Plandek - Metrics and insights for software delivery © SaaS
  • Moiva.io - A dashboard with charts and graphs to evaluate and compare any npm package. © SaaS

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Jan 25, 2021
entry.content:
General analytics

  • Heap - tracks your app users, clicks, form submissions, and anything else. © SaaS

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Jan 23, 2021
entry.content:
General analytics

  • Hotjar - new and easy way to truly understand your web and mobile site visitors. © SaaS
  • Opentracker - real time reporting, geo-location user tracking. © SaaS
  • FoxMetrics - analytics to track your user’s actions and activities. © SaaS
  • Adobe Analytics - web data into insights that everyone can act on. © SaaS
  • Google Analytics - de facto standard for analytics in the web analytics space. © SaaS
  • Screpy - Screpy is a web analyzer and monitoring tool. Its powered by Google Lighthouse. © SaaS
  • Clicktale - record and watch exactly how a visitor used your website. © SaaS
  • GoSquared - analytics with visitor tagging to help you dig deeper into one user’s visit. © SaaS
  • Clicky - track visits and conversions, you can also track your video and audio analytics. © SaaS
  • Woopra - track where your users are coming from. © SaaS
  • Mint - self-hosted analytics solution (no longer on sale). © SaaS
  • Going Up - manage SEO analytics and web app analytics with one tool. © SaaS
  • Chartbeat - beautiful, real-time app analytics tool for web apps. © SaaS
  • Gauges - real-time web analytics tool. © SaaS
  • Indicative - Web & mobile analytics tool, with heavy emphasis on segmentation and funnel visualization. © SaaS
  • Statcounter - one of the ORIGINAL web analytics tools available. © SaaS
  • Adobe Digital Analytics - standard analytics tools plus some that large organizations can use. © SaaS
  • Hitslink.com - real-time analytics, social media traffic reporting, and real-time dynamic segmentation. © SaaS
  • parse.ly - real-time web analytics tool with a focus on tracking content. © SaaS
  • Loggr - track your user events and monitor your web app. © SaaS
  • Kissmetrics - real-time standard cohort analysis tool. © SaaS
  • Sitemeter - old analytics tool. © SaaS
  • Crawl Track - another old analytics tool. © SaaS
  • Sitespect - full-suite web app analytics tool including A/B testing. © SaaS
  • Metabase - opensource analytics/BI tool © SaaS
  • LiveSession - session replay user analytics. © SaaS
  • Glassbox - customer experince and session recording analytics. © SaaS
  • Redash - open source analytics/BI tool © SaaS

Privacy focused analytics

  • Fathom - Fathom Analytics provides simple, useful websites stats without tracking or storing personal data of your users © SaaS
  • Simple Analytics - Simple, clean, and friendly analytics for developers © SaaS
  • Nibspace - Affordable, lightweight, privacy-friendly website analytics © SaaS

Heatmap analytics

  • Crazyegg - a heatmaps only analytics tool. © SaaS
  • Inspeclet - another web app heatmaps tool. © SaaS
  • Mouseflow - live analytics and heatmaps. © SaaS
  • Session Cam - heatmaps analytics tool. © SaaS

Analytics layers

  • Keen.io - custom-analytics API. © SaaS
  • Popcorn Metrics - visual editor to capture events and send to other platforms. © SaaS
  • Segment - helps you integrate multiple app analytics tool with one piece of code. © SaaS
  • Iteratively - capture clean product analytics consistently across teams & platforms. © SaaS
  • Analytics npm package - A lightweight, extendable analytics library designed to work with any third-party analytics provider to track page views, custom events, & identify users. Works in browsers & node.js. © SaaS

Mobile analytics

  • Upsight - mobile app analytics tool for developers. © SaaS
  • Appsflyer - all-in-one marketing tool with analytics. © SaaS
  • Amazon Pinpoint - Amazons multi-platform, basic mobile analytics tool. © SaaS
  • Tapstream - user lifecycle analytics. © SaaS
  • Honeytracks - mobile app analytics for games. © SaaS
  • Apsalar - analytics tool for larger app shops. © SaaS
  • Roambi - 3-in-1 analytics tool that helps you track analytics, handle mobile app business intelligence, and app reporting. © SaaS
  • Appcelerator - entire mobile app marketing suite. © SaaS
  • Flurry - pretty much the “industry standard” for mobile app analytics. © SaaS
  • Countly - open source mobile & web application analytics tool. © SaaS
  • Playtomatic - mobile app open source analytics tool for games. © SaaS
  • Capptain - real-time analytics tool with segmentation and push. © SaaS
  • Amplitude - real-time mobile analytics with all data provided in redshift. © SaaS
  • Appsee - mobile app analytics platform automatically tracks all users' interactions in your app © SaaS
  • Mixpanel - fully featured mobile analytics platform with segmentation and push. © SaaS
  • Localytics - fast and beautiful real-time mobile analytics platform with in-app and push. © SaaS
  • GameAnalytics - leading game analytics platform. © SaaS
  • Swrve - mobile analytics with segmentation, push, A/B testing and rich messaging © SaaS
  • Firebase - a free and unlimited analytics solution for android and iOS © SaaS
  • Liquid - real-time mobile analytics, personalization, multivariate testing, audience segmentation and push. © SaaS

App store analytics

  • Appfigures - app store analytics to track sales, reviews and rankings with an API. © SaaS
  • Appannie - track your app data from iTunes, Google Play & Amazon. © SaaS
  • Distimo - free app store analytics (acquired by Appannie). © SaaS
  • Priori Data - track and benchmark the performance of apps on Apple- and Play store. © SaaS
  • Asking Point - track your mobile app user ratings. © SaaS
  • Apptrace - fast and free app store analytics platform. © SaaS

Attribution tracking

  • Adjust - open-source SDK with sophisticated analysis and campaign tracking. © SaaS
  • Clickmeter - analytics tool that helps you track marketing campaigns. © SaaS
  • HasOffers Mobile app tracking - attribution analytics platform. © SaaS

Social media analytics

  • Brandwatch - Social media monitoring and analytics. © SaaS
  • Falconsocial - communications platform built on social media with analytics. © SaaS
  • Quintly - web-based tool to help you track, benchmark and optimize your social media performance. © SaaS
  • Kred - Klout-like social media analytics platform. © SaaS
  • Buffer - Social media publishing and analytics platform. © SaaS
  • Topsy - Social analytics tool with search. © SaaS
  • SocialBlade - premiere YouTube statistics tracking. © SaaS
  • Hootsuite - Social media management dashbaord. © SaaS
  • Sproutsocial - Social media management and analytics platform. © SaaS

Developer analytics

  • GitSpo - Analytics for Open-Source. © SaaS

Analytics dashboards

  • Freeboard (⭐6.5k) - open source real-time dashboard builder for IOT and other web mashups. © SaaS
  • Geckboard - dashboard for key metrics in one place. © SaaS
  • Klipfolio - Klipfolio is an online dashboard platform for building powerful real-time business dashboards for your team or your clients. © SaaS
  • Vizia - Visual command center dashboarding solution © SaaS

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Jan 12, 2021
entry.content:
Analytics dashboards

  • EDA - EDA is an user friendly Analtical Tool specially designed for busines users. (Source Code (⭐150)) Apache-2.0 Angular/Nodejs

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Dec 02, 2020
entry.content:
Analytics dashboards

  • Chartbrew - Chartbrew allows you to query your databases and APIs to create live charts and visualize your data. You can share your charts with anyone or embed them on your own sites, blogs, Notion, etc. (Demo, Source Code (⭐3.3k)) MIT NodeJS

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Nov 16, 2020
entry.content:
Endpoints

  • RudderStack - The warehouse-first customer data platform (CDP) that builds your CDP on your data warehouse for you. RudderStack makes it easy to collect, unify, transform, and store your customer data as well as route it securely to a wide range of common, popular marketing, sales, and product tools (open-source alternative to Segment et al.). (Source Code (⭐4.2k)) AGPL-3.0 Go

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Nov 06, 2020
entry.content:
Privacy focused analytics

  • piratepx - Just a little analytics insight for your personal or indie project. 100% free and open source. (Demo, Source (⭐84)) MIT Nodejs

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Oct 05, 2020
entry.content:
General analytics

  • Matomo - Leading open-source analytics platform that gives you more than just powerful analytics, formerly known as Piwik. (Source Code) GPL-3.0 PHP
  • Open Web Analytics - Google Analytics and Matomo alternative. (Source Code (⭐2.6k)) GPL-2.0 PHP
  • Rakam - Custom analytics platform that lets you to create your own analytics service. Integrate with any data source (web, mobile, IoT etc.), analyze data with SQL and create dashboards. (Source Code (⭐797)) Apache-2.0 Java
  • AWStats - Generates web, streaming, ftp or mail server statistics graphically. (Source Code (⭐400)) GPL-3.0 Perl
  • Countly - Real time mobile and web analytics, crash reporting and push notifications platform. (Source Code) AGPL-3.0 Javascript
  • Druid - Distributed, column-oriented, real-time analytics data store. (Source Code (⭐14k)) Apache-2.0 Java
  • Hastic - Hackable time series pattern recognition tool with UI for Grafana. (Source Code) Apache-2.0 Python/Nodejs

Real-time

  • GoAccess - Real-time web log analyzer and interactive viewer that runs in a terminal. (Source Code (⭐20k)) GPL-2.0 C

Website analytics

  • KISSS - Very minimalistic (KISS) website statistics tool. (Source Code) MIT Go

Endpoints

  • Snowplow - Analytics tool for web apps with a lot of data. Have every single event, from your websites, mobile apps, desktop applications and server-side systems, stored in your own data warehouse and available to action in real-time. (Source Code) Apache-2.0 Scala real-time

SEO

  • Serposcope - Serposcope is a free and open-source rank tracker to monitor websites ranking in Google and improve your SEO performances. (Source Code (⭐751)) MIT Java

Privacy focused analytics

  • Plausible Analytics - Lightweight and open source (⭐23k) web analytics. Doesn’t use cookies and doesn't track personal data. A privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics. (Source Code (⭐23k)) MIT Elixir
  • GoatCounter - Easy web statistics without tracking of personal data; SaaS Self-Hosted (Source Code (⭐5k)) EUPL-1.2 Go
  • Shynet (⭐3k) - Modern, privacy-friendly, and detailed web analytics that works without cookies or JS. Designed for self-hosting. Apache-2.0 Python
  • Umami - Umami is a simple, easy to use, self-hosted web analytics solution. The goal is to provide you with a friendlier, privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics and a free, open-sourced alternative to paid solutions. (Demo, Source Code (⭐27k)) MIT Nodejs
  • Koko Analytics - Privacy-friendly and open source analytics plugin for WordPress. (Source Code (⭐377)) GPL-3.0 PHP
  • Offen - Offen is a fair and open web analytics tool. Gain insights while your users have full access to their data. Lightweight, self hosted and free. (Demo, Source Code (⭐944)) Apache-2.0 Go/Docker
  • Freshlytics (⭐355) - Privacy respecting, cookie free and low resource usage analytics platform. MIT Docker/Nodejs
  • Kindmetrics - Clean privacy-focused website analytics. (Source Code (⭐93)) MIT Crystal
  • Ackee - Self-hosted analytics tool for those who care about privacy. (Demo, Source Code (⭐4.4k)) MIT Nodejs

Analytics dashboards

  • Metabase - Metabase is the easy, open source way for everyone in your company to ask questions and learn from data. Simple Dashboarding and GUI Query tool, Nightly Emails and Slack Integration w/ PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redshift and other DBs. (Source Code (⭐43k)) AGPL-3.0 Java
  • Redash - connect to over 18 types of databases (SQL and "NoSQL"), query your data, visualize it and create dashboards. Everything has a URL that can be shared. Slack and HipChat integration. (Demo, Source Code (⭐28k)) BSD-2-Clause Python
  • Superset - Modern, enterprise-ready business intelligence web application. (Source Code (⭐67k)) Apache-2.0 Python
  • Socioboard - ⚠ Social media management, analytics, and reporting platform supporting nine social media networks out-of-the-box. (Source Code (⭐1.3k)) GPL-3.0 C#/JavaScript

entry.title: Awesome Analytics Updates on Aug 24, 2014
entry.content:
Analytics dashboards

  • Other awesome lists awesome-awesomeness (⭐33k).
  • Even more lists awesome (⭐381k).
  • Another list? list (⭐10k).
  • WTF! awesome-awesome-awesome (⭐2k).
  • Analytics awesome-bigdata (⭐14k).
